data.title: Estonian Phrases in Turkish
data.text:
Main Languages Spoken in Estonia: Estonian (official) 67.3%, Russian 29.7%, other 2.3%, unknown 0.7% (2000 census).

Do you know how to order your food in Estonian? Talk to the locals in Estonia with our Estonian holiday language phrases guide.

The Estonian language phrases guide shows you how to say the every day phrases to ordering food at restaurants in Estonia. Order your Estonian language phrase guide from Estonian Phrase Guide.

Estonian Language Lessons Online for Beginners – There are several free Estonian language lesson for beginners, with basic Estonian phrases and video clips to help you pronounce Estonian words easily.

Estonian Language Lessons Online for Business – Are you looking for Estonian language courses for you or your company’s staff? Several Estonian language schools in your area offer private Estonian tuition classes or small Estonian classes.
